mapper.sql: id, batch_number, receivable_price, receipts_price, fail_price, number, success_number, fail_number, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.batch_number "batchNumber",a.create_time "createTime" , a.receivable_price "receivablePrice", a.receipts_price "receiptsPrice", COALESCE(a.fail_price,0) "failPrice" , a.number, a.success_number "successNumber", a.fail_number "failNumber" , b.name "userName" from lease_allinpay_batch a LEFT JOIN lease_user b on a.create_by=b.id WHERE 1=1
and a.create_time BETWEEN to_timestamp(#{effectiveTimeFrom},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_timestamp(#{effectiveTimeTo},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and a.id=#{allinpayBatchId}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT nextval('lease_allinpay_batch_id_seq'::regclass) as id
insert into lease_allinpay_batch (id, batch_number, receivable_price, receipts_price, fail_price, number, success_number, fail_number, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{batchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivablePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{receiptsPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{failPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{successNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{failNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT})

SELECT nextval('lease_allinpay_batch_id_seq'::regclass) as id
insert into lease_allinpay_batch
id,
batch_number,
receivable_price,
receipts_price,
fail_price,
number,
success_number,
fail_number,
create_time,
update_time,
create_by,
update_by

mapper.update:
update lease_allinpay_batch
batch_number = #{batchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receivable_price = #{receivablePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
receipts_price = #{receiptsPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
fail_price = #{failPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
success_number = #{successNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fail_number = #{failNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update lease_allinpay_batch set batch_number = #{batchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receivable_price = #{receivablePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, receipts_price = #{receiptsPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, fail_price = #{failPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, success_number = #{successNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fail_number = #{failNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
